body:
Comment 3: 
No.

Newlines are everywhere, literally on every line of every text file;
escape bytes are not nearly as common.  And Go 1 is done: \e is hardly
compelling enough to introduce an incompatibility between Go 1 and the
eventual Go 1.1.  And it is so easy to do without.  And you should be
using a library instead of writing ANSI codes by hand.  And it's not
1978.
